name: Chaos Campaign
description: It's time Medusa got a chance to tell her side of the story :)

name: Stick War 2: Empires
description: A mod where you can choose your empire to play against the enemy! The campaign isn't edited at all and equal to the original one in SW2, except one thing :)

name: Elemental Empire
description: Forge your own path to victory as you lead your Elemental Army into battle against formidable foes.
file: mods/elemental-empire/Stick War 2 Elemental Empire Beta v2.35.swf

name: User Control
description: Featuring everyone's favorite classic mechanic from Stick War, the ability to completely control one overpowered unit, reimagined in Stick War 2!

name: Golden Units
description: Golden Units in this mod will actively earn gold with every attack. All gold units give gold when they die.

name: Stickmas War
description: Instaqueue Units! Enjoy Passive Income! Spread Stickmas Cheer! Jam to Metal Christmas music! Try to beat the SURVIVAL AI!

name: Barricades
description: 3 levels, 1 for each empire contain 2 walls that are directly on top of each other at the center tower. Each wall has 15k hp. Both sides must destroy their respective walls to advance.

name: 2v2
description: Each battle features 2 tribes battling it out with epic custom units and unique spawning!

name: Custom Giants
description: Each Giant boasts its own special skin with effects that redefine the battlefield!

name: Kaizo
description: This mod makes everything much harder and 'Fun' with lots of new specialties and a reworked Upgrade system.

name: Realistic Mode
description: Archidons one-shot unarmored units, Mana is replaced with Army Population, Shinobi lasts forever, Speartons move slow (cause of armor) and more!

name: Gold Rush
description: All the gold mines are in the middle! Good luck!

name: Sicklewrath vs Bloodblades
description: Many types of Sicklewrath vs Bloodblades!

name: Sicklewrath vs Bloodblades 2
description: The rematch of a century

name: The Mysterious Unknown
description: Who knows what awaits in the mysterious unknown?

name: New Units
description: New Units in Stick War 1!

name: Remixed! (Part 1)
description: Re-experience the popular hit sequel web game Stick War 2 by StickPage Studios in an entire remix of more interactable plot line and a new age of modern challenges.

name: Remixed! (Part 2)
description: Re-experience the popular hit sequel web game Stick War 2 by StickPage Studios in an entire remix of more interactable plot line and a new age of modern challenges.

name: Stick War
description: Play the game Stick War, one of the biggest most fun, challenging, and addicting stick figure games online.

name: Stick War 2: Order Empire
description: The epic sequel to the hit strategy game Stick War!

name: Stick Empires
description: Battle players from around the world online as Order, Chaos or Elementals!
